summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1570, for the improvement of West Forty-sixth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eleventh Avenue Northwest to Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all manholes, catch basins, flush tanks, wyes, openings, and other appurtenances, necessary for the proper sewerage of said street, under Ordinance No. 16793, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
